full_description:
Value-Top T200B Real 200W ATX Power Supply

The Value-Top T200B Real 200W ATX Power Supply is a reliable and efficient option for desktop computer systems, with a consistent power output of 200W. Active Power Factor Correction (PFC) enables efficient power use, which improves system performance and lifetime. Operating on an AC input of 200-230V at 50-60Hz, this power supply has an efficiency of more than 85%, improving energy efficiency. The noise level is maintained low at 14dB owing to a 120mm fan that not only helps with cooling but also ensures silent operation. This power supply is designed in the ATX form factor, making it compatible with a broad range of computer systems. It has a single 12V rail to provide dependable power delivery. The Value-Top T200B meets industry requirements for quality and safety since it is ATX12V, CE, and ROHS certified. It includes several safety techniques, including Over Power safety (OPP), Over Voltage Protection (OVP), Under Voltage Protection (UVP), and Short Circuit Protection (SCP), to safeguard your components from potential hazards. The box contains necessary cables and connections, such as 2x SATA connectors, 1x IDE connector, and a 1.2m UK power cord, allowing for a simple and convenient setup. Whether you prefer performance, efficiency, or safety, the Value-Top T200B Real 200W ATX Power Supply is a dependable and adaptable option for a wide range of desktop systems.

full_description:
Value-Top AX450M Real 450W ATX Power Supply

The Value-Top AX450M is a high-performance ATX power supply offering a maximum output of 450W. Its full modular design allows for a tidy and clutter-free build by enabling users to connect only the necessary cables, contributing to a clean and organized system layout. With an efficiency rating of over 85%, this power supply ensures optimal utilization of electrical power, resulting in reduced energy consumption and minimal heat generation. Utilizing Surface Mount Device (SMD) technology and A-grade components, the AX450M prioritizes reliability and longevity for stable performance over time. The single 12V rail design guarantees a consistent and reliable power delivery, crucial for system stability during demanding tasks such as gaming or content creation. The incorporation of AI-RPM (Artificial Intelligence - RPM) enables dynamic fan speed adjustments based on system temperature, contributing to efficient temperature control and prolonged component lifespan. The versatile cable connectors include 1 x P20+4, 1 x P4+4, 2 x PCI6+2, 2 x IDE 4P, and 4 x SATA, catering to various hardware configurations. The 12CM fan, equipped with a steel fan grid, ensures effective cooling while maintaining low noise levels, creating a comfortable computing environment. The Value-Top AX450M combines modular design, high efficiency, intelligent temperature control, and quality components to provide a reliable and efficient power supply solution for a diverse range of computing needs.
